english.segment1: Worship You My Lord. Until the very end. Worship you My Lord. Until the very end
english.segment2: Jesus Lover of my soul. Jesus i will never let you go. youve taken me from the miry clay. Set my feet upon a rock and now i know
english.segment3: I love you. I need you. Though my world may fall i'll never let you go. My saviour, My closest friend. I will worship you. Until the very end.
